forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 89 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely before 8pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 67, with temperatures rising to around 70 overnight. West wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
